title: Topic 001 Question 319
body: Your risk management organization requires that new AWS S3 buckets must be private and encrypted at rest. How can Terraform Cloud automatically and proactively enforce this security control?
options: Auditing cloud storage buckets with a vulnerability scanning tool
With a Sentinel policy, which runs before every apply
With an S3 module with proper settings for buckets
By adding variables to each Terraform Cloud workspace to ensure these settings are always enabled
